official_title: A bill to designate the National Space Technology Laboratories in Bay St. Louis, Mississippi, as the "John C. Stennis Space Center".

summary.text: Designates as the John C. Stennis Space Center the National Space Technology Laboratories of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration located in Bay St. Louis, Mississippi.

titles.title: A bill to designate the National Space Technology Laboratories in Bay St. Louis, Mississippi, as the "John C. Stennis Space Center".
